game.name: Oldest Golden Treasure
game.categories: Single-player, VR Only, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Step into the role of a detective, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth behind your colleague’s disappearance. Travel through time, explore immersive worlds, and crack the mystery in this VR escape room adventure!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into the role of a detective, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth behind your colleague’s disappearance. Travel through time, explore immersive worlds, and crack the mystery in this VR escape room adventure!
